ConstTrackListIterator Class Reference

#include <Track.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

ConstTrackListIterator provides an iterator to iterate through a TrackList.

Member Data Documentation

const TrackList* ConstTrackListIterator::l [private]

TrackListNode* ConstTrackListIterator::cur [mutable, private]

pointer to the current node of the track list

This is used to keep track of where we are in the list. It is a mutable member of the class because although the list and the iterator are constant, the current position can change (and does change) without affecting them. Without this keyword we would get compiler errors about const methods altering member variables. See also http://www.highprogrammer.com/alan/rants/mutable.html
